name: custom-plugin-javascript
description: Comprehensive JavaScript learning plugin with 7 specialized agents, 7 skills, and 4 slash commands. Complete learning path from fundamentals to advanced ecosystem.
author: Claude Code

agents.name: JavaScript Fundamentals
agents.description: Core JavaScript basics: variables, data types, operators, control flow, and syntax

agents.name: Functions & Scope Expert
agents.description: Functions, scope, closures, hoisting, and execution context

agents.name: Objects & Arrays Specialist
agents.description: Objects, arrays, prototypal inheritance, and data structures

agents.name: Asynchronous JavaScript Master
agents.description: Callbacks, Promises, async/await, event loop, and concurrency

agents.name: DOM & Browser APIs Guide
agents.description: DOM manipulation, events, Web APIs, and browser interactions

agents.name: Modern ES6+ Specialist
agents.description: Classes, modules, destructuring, spread operator, and advanced features

agents.name: JavaScript Ecosystem Expert
agents.description: Package managers, build tools, testing frameworks, and ecosystem

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start a guided JavaScript learning path

skills.name: functions
skills.description: Advanced function patterns and scope management

skills.name: data-structures
skills.description: Objects, arrays, and data structure patterns

skills.name: modern-javascript
skills.description: Modern ES6+ features and advanced patterns
